response.overview: CatVideoFest is a compilation reel of the latest and best cat videos culled from countless hours of unique submissions and sourced animations, music videos, and classic internet powerhouses. CatVideoFest is a joyous communal experience, only available in theaters, and raises money for cats in need through partnerships with local cat charities, animal welfare organizations, and shelters to best serve cats in the area.
response.tagline: The worldâ€™s #1 cat video festival is coming back in 2022 to theaters across the USA and around the world!
response.title: CatVideoFest 2022
